column4: Several things in my ubuntu desktop are going wrong, and i cant pinpoint what the hell is fucking every thing up
Please watch your language.  Also, "doesn't work" doesn't tell us a whole lot.
medibuntu doesn't have smplayer, but the regular repositories do.
to install smplayer, just install it through your favorite package manager.  Here's a howto for the most popular GUI one: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SynapticHowto
